name: Cabaret Lounge
description: The Cabaret Lounge at Carson Valley Inn offers free nightly live entertainment, cocktails, and a relaxed atmosphere in the heart of Carson Valley. Performers play seven nights a week (except during football season), providing listening and dancing entertainment for guests. It's a great place to unwind after playing Genoa Lakes, Eagle Valley, or Dayton Valley golf courses.
shortDescription: Free nightly live entertainment with cocktails at Carson Valley Inn.

faqs.question: What entertainment does the Cabaret Lounge offer?
faqs.answer: Live music, comedy shows, and special events featuring regional and national performers.

faqs.question: Is the Cabaret Lounge inside the Carson Valley Inn?
faqs.answer: Yes, it's located within the Carson Valley Inn Casino in Minden, Nevada.

faqs.question: Which golf courses are nearby?
faqs.answer: Genoa Lakes, Dayton Valley, Eagle Valley, and Toiyabe golf courses are all within easy driving distance.

meta.title: Cabaret Lounge – Carson Valley Inn Entertainment | Golf The High Sierra
meta.description: Enjoy live entertainment and comedy at the Cabaret Lounge in Carson Valley Inn. The perfect après-golf spot near Carson Valley courses.

testimonials.quote: Cabaret Lounge has become our go-to after-golf hangout. Cold beers, good energy, and it's right inside carson-valley-inn-casino. GTHS knows all the best spots.
testimonials.author: Brandon K.

testimonials.quote: Post-round drinks at Cabaret Lounge are a must. Our whole group gathered here after 18 holes and the vibe was perfect. Good cocktails, sports on the TVs, and the staff handled our large tab easily.
testimonials.author: Tom F.
